products.name: Apple iphone 15 pro max
products.description: FORGED IN TITANIUM — iPhone 15 Pro Max has a strong and light aerospace-grade titanium design with a textured matte-glass back. It also features a Ceramic Shield front that’s tougher than any smartphone glass. And it’s splash, water, and dust resistant.

products.name: iphone 15
products.description: FORGED IN TITANIUM — iPhone 15 Pro Max has a strong and light aerospace-grade titanium design with a textured matte-glass back. It also features a Ceramic Shield front that’s tougher than any smartphone glass. And it’s splash, water, and dust resistant.

specifications.performance: Chipset: Apple A17 Pro (3 nm)  CPU: Hexa-core (2x3.78 GHz + 4x2.11 GHz)  GPU: Apple GPU (6-core graphics)  Memory: 8GB RAM  Storage Options: 128GB, 256GB, 512GB, 1TB (NVMe)
specifications.display: Type: LTPO Super Retina XDR OLED, 120Hz, HDR10, Dolby Vision  Size: 6.1 inches  Resolution: 1179 x 2556 pixels (~461 ppi)  Brightness: 1000 nits (typical), 2000 nits (HBM)  Protection: Ceramic Shield glass
specifications.camera: Main Camera: Triple  48 MP, f/1.8, 24mm (wide), 1/1.28", 1.22µm, dual pixel PDAF, sensor-shift OIS  12 MP, f/2.8, 77mm (telephoto), 1/3.5", 1.0µm, PDAF, OIS, 3x optical zoom  12 MP, f/2.2, 13mm, 120˚ (ultrawide), 1/2.55", 1.4µm, dual pixel PDAF  Features: Dual-LED dual-tone flash, HDR, 4K video recording, Photonic Engine, Deep Fusion, Smart HDR 5, Night mode, LiDAR Scanner

products.name: POCO C61 Ethereal Blue
products.description: The POCO C61 in Ethereal Blue offers 4GB RAM and 64GB ROM, expandable up to 1TB, and features a 6.71-inch HD+ display with a 90 Hz refresh rate, powered by the Helio G36 chipset. It comes equipped with an 8MP rear camera and a 5MP front camera, and a 5000 mAh battery with 10W Type-C fast charging. Additional features include Corning Gorilla Glass 3 for durability, a fingerprint sensor, dual SIM support, and a sleek Radiant Ring design

specifications.performance: High performance MediaTek Helio G36,upto 2.2GHz; | 6.71" HD+ 90Hz Display with GG3 Protection | Upto 8GB RAM including 4GB Virtual RAM |64GB Storage | Fast Side fingerprint sensor
specifications.display: Large 17.04 cm 90Hz dot display with Corning Gorilla Glass 3 protection | 500nits peak brightness | 180Hz Touch sampling Rate
specifications.camera: Large 17.04 cm 90Hz dot display with Corning Gorilla Glass 3 protection | 500nits peak brightness | 180Hz Touch sampling Rate 8MP AI Dual camera with Google lens, Portrait mode and classic film filters| 5MP Front camera
specifications.battery: 5000mAh(typ) battery and 10W charger in-box with USB Type-C
